timeline.bodyText: This is more a question for the forge team than you directly, but does this need some sort of fallback given technically this is a "breaking change", and now that forge has an RB.
timeline.author: pupnewfster

replies.bodyText: Normally the answer would be yes, however this is an event factory used within the chunk manager. No mod should be calling this. Lex has the last word as always, but this doesn't feel like it conflicts with the "no breaking changes" rule.
replies.author: gigaherz

replies.bodyText: Yes it falls under binary compatibility
replies.author: LexManos
